title: 3 Important Information Regarding India to Singapore Flight (Pooja Shree)
text: By Pooja Shree Aug 6, 2015 As the world is turning into a global village, the connectivity between countries has increased. With numerous airlines flying across new flight routes, connecting intra-continental as well as intercontinental destinations, the aviation industry has experienced a boom. Many options are now available for globetrotters and businessmen, who frequently need to travel from one place to another. Among the major destinations of Asia, a number of India to Singapore flight, both direct and connecting have emerged, that cover a distance of around 3347 km in less than 5 hours. This has enhanced the scope for tourism as well as trade relations between these nations. Many national and private airlines fly on the India- Singapore route with the difference in the number of stops and duration of flight. Here is a list of options for travellers looking forward to travel across these countries, on the basis of three criteria. Journey time For people on a tight schedule, many airlines are available that operate direct India to Singapore flight. There are around 12 such services available from, Bengaluru, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kochi, Kolkata, New Delhi and Vishakhapatnam airports to Changi Airport. It generally involves a journey time of around 5-8 hours. Air India, Singapore Airlines and Jet Airways offer some of the best options to reach the destination within 5 hours 45 minutes. You can also avail connecting flights from all other major airports in the country, with one or two stops. The main stops on this route are Kuala Lumpur, Bangkok and Colombo. Depending on the routes that are taken and layover times at the connecting stop, the duration of flights differ. Many carriers, like Malaysia Airlines, have one-stop flights, which arrive at Changi airport in less than 9 hours. Carriers that make a halt at two or more stops may take longer, and the prices of flights often vary occurring to the number of stopovers. Budget trip Tourists travelling on a budget to Singapore can explore a variety of offers and discounts on India to Singapore flight fare, provided by many airlines. The price range generally varies from INR 14000 to 350000. However, many online travel agencies (OTAs) also give opportunities to travel at dramatically low prices numerous times a year. Similarly, some travel companies and airlines offer discounts on booking round trips instead of one-way journeys. Booking tickets in advance is another advantage that travellers can use, as many carriers sell tickets at lower rates 3-4 month before the scheduled departure. However, this depends on the schemes of the company. It is important that travellers check the baggage allowance and additional fee payable for carrying extra luggage than the standard weight allowed, before boarding. They can avail all the relevant information for air tickets to Singapore on OTAs. Airlines A large number of airlines serve on India-Singapore routes. Among them, some national airlines that operate between these countries are Air India, Malaysian Airline, Singapore Airlines and Sri Lankan Airlines. Air India operates over 30 flights - the highest number services on this route. The number of weekend flights to Singapore offered by this carrier is even more. Private airlines like Jet Airways and Indigo also offer their services on this route. The prices of tickets also vary according to the airline chosen. Air India offers some of the best deals on flight fares for passengers. About the Author This information can be useful to people planning to travel on India to Singapore flights . It is always advisable to book your flight in advance, check and compare online before booking flight tickets. Rating:
